title: All Ball - AD Is Top 5; Kyrie/Nets Concerns; Guest: Hoops Writer Adam Zagoria talks Nets, Knicks, College Hoops
itunes:title: All Ball - AD Is Top 5; Kyrie/Nets Concerns; Guest: Hoops Writer Adam Zagoria talks Nets, Knicks, College Hoops
description:
This week, Gottlieb on why Anthony Davis is a Top 5 NBA player, if reports of Kyrie already creating headaches with the Nets is a sign of worse things to come, and talks Kyrie and the Nets drama, Knicks direction, and a developing scandal at Seton Hall over recruit tampering with hoops writer Adam Zagoria. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
